question:
[Dana] loves cooking for her son. His name is [Joseph] [William] enjoys going fishing with his brother. His name is [Joseph]. [Manuel] was disappointed that his father, [Kenneth], would n't be at the play to see him perform. [Michele] was mad at her son, [Charlie]. She found he'd been stealing from her purse. [Dana]'s son [William] is turning nine today, so she is throwing him a party. [Jami] asked her mother, [Michele], what they were going to have for lunch. [Charlie] went to visit his grandmother, [Dana], in Europe. [Jami] planned a trip to the zoo for her brother, [Manuel]. They had a great time. [Manuel] has a few children, [Kenneth], Bradley and Claire
Question: How is [Dana] related to [Manuel]?
